forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening. Periods of light snow late. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 31F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
